message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I can see you're interested!  How about we meet in the middle at $132?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
